sentences.english: Our closest relatives straightened their backs and began walking upright on two legs.
sentences.chinese: 人類的祖先伸直了後肢開始直立行走。

sentences.english: In circles, his hindquarters will swing out and he will find great difficulty in bending through his neck and body.
sentences.chinese: 在圈乘中，後肢會偏出，脖子身體的曲撓也十分困難。

sentences.english: Each hind leg moves in the path of the foreleg on the same side.
sentences.chinese: 每條後肢在行進中都與前肢在同一側。

sentences.english: Dancing Dobermann disease progresses over a few years to rear leg weakness and muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 該疾病發展數年後，後肢出現虛弱無力和肌肉萎縮。

sentences.english: After the stimulation, convulsion of 100% seizure in rats occurred by the rigidity of double hindlimb as index.
sentences.chinese: 刺激後大鼠100%驚厥發作，以雙後肢強直爲指標。

sentences.english: The toe of the raised hind leg should reach just above the fetlock joint of the other hind leg.
sentences.chinese: 後蹄尖擡起的高度應剛好達到另一側後肢球節的上方。

sentences.english: Dewclaws, if any, on the hind legs are generally removed.
sentences.chinese: 如果後肢有狼爪，通常需要切除。

sentences.english: It often occurs in the rear legs and is bilateral.
sentences.chinese: 疾病通常發生在後肢，通常是雙側的。

sentences.english: The legs were certainly functional both on land and at sea.
sentences.chinese: 這些後肢使得他們既能在陸地行走又能在海里遊行。

sentences.english: It had asymmetric flight feathers not only on the forelimb, but on the hindlimb as well.
sentences.chinese: 它已非對稱飛羽不僅對前肢，但對後肢以及。

sentences.english: BBB scoring of motor function of hindlimb of rats.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠後肢運動功能BBB評分測定結果。

sentences.english: They make no distinction between frontline and hind the line.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有前線和後肢之間線的區別。

sentences.english: The horse returns to the track without the hind legs crossing.
sentences.chinese: 在馬回到蹄跡線時後肢不能交叉。

sentences.english: Ventral ( or pelvic ) fins correspond to the hind limbs of a quadruped .
sentences.chinese: 腹鰭對應着四足動物的後肢。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)
